trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around September 15th 1966
Summary: black triangle 5 of them flying in a triangle
divs: Sighting Detailswas waiting for a friend after school in 1966 at a basketball court at marlow heights rec. center nobody around when I look up at a apartment building when I saw what I beleve to be a flock of geese I then started to shoot a the basket hoop the ball when past me went after it then since I did not here any noise from the geese I look towards them an notice it was not geese but a group of triangular shape objects they came right above me making no noise so close I THREW my ball at them then they slowly move away an went west my friend show up then I pointed at them so he could see them so I would not look crazy then right after they vanish it was a overcast day we notice in south a red fire ball in the sky the triangular objects came from the north when I first saw them did not tell anybody about them until the late 90's I was in the 10 grade I just want to no if anybody saw what me and my friend saw because of the fireball happen at the same time I thing somebody reported it .it made no noise five of them flying in a triangle an moved in order together when it turn I am not making this up I no what i saw if you check out about the fireball I think it was in 1966 in the fall at southern maryland area
